nodes.bodyText: not sure if it's my head spinning or if I'm actually brain here, but is this the correct way around?

It is: If the random value is equal or above the spawn chance it will not attempt to spawn. E.g. a spawn chance of 0.2 and a random value of 0.6 would not result in a spawn. (I know it's a bit unintuitive but it has to be this way around because of the structure of the vanilla code which checks if nextInt(5) is 0 so anything above 0 would not hit it)
